entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is described as a person who has brought friends to meet Grawpy. He is also mentioned as having gone on a trip and leaving them to look after Grawpy.

entities.name: grawp
entities.description: Grawp is described as a giant who is at least sixteen feet tall. He is also mentioned as not recognizing Hagrid's speech.

relationships.description: Hagrid has brought friends to meet Grawpy, indicating that he is responsible for taking care of Grawpy.
Hagrid mentioned that he might have to go on a trip and leave them (presumably the friends) to look after Grawpy.
